articles.description: For the first time in their history, Germany failed to progress to the knockout stages of the Women's World Cup and players could not comprehend it.
articles.title: Germany captain 'can't comprehend' World Cup exit

articles.description: Arsenal goalkeeper Aaron Ramsdale says he wants football to be "welcoming for everyone", allowing his brother, who is gay, to attend matches without fear of abuse.
articles.title: I stayed quiet but that ends today - Ramsdale

articles.description: Watch live as Hibs host Inter d'Escaldes of Andorra as they try to overturn a 2-1 deficit in their Europa Conference League qualifier.
articles.title: Watch: Europa Conference League - can Hibs overturn deficit against Andorrans?

articles.description: England head coach Steve Borthwick says his final 33-man squad for the World Cup is "pretty clear" with only "one or two places" to be finalised.
articles.title: Borthwick 'pretty clear' on final World Cup squad

articles.description: The Hundred match between Northern Superchargers and Birmingham Phoenix is abandoned following heavy rain at Headingley.
articles.title: Superchargers v Phoenix abandoned due to heavy rain

articles.description: Watch highlights as Anissa Lahmari's goal was enough to help Morocco beat Colombia 1-0 a result that sees both sides qualify for the last 16 of the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Morocco beat Colombia to seal shock last-16 spot

articles.description: Chelsea agree a deal to sign Brighton goalkeeper Robert Sanchez for £25m plus add-ons.
articles.title: Chelsea agree £25m deal for Brighton keeper Sanchez

articles.description: Alice Davidson-Richards stars with the ball as Northern Superchargers beat Birmingham Phoenix by seven wickets at Headingley.
articles.title: Davidson-Richards powers Superchargers to win

articles.description: Northern Superchargers bowler Georgia Wareham takes a stunning catch to remove Birmingham Phoenix batter Erin Burns at Headingley in The Hundred.
articles.title: 'That ball was flying!' - Wareham takes stunning catch
